law.text: The integrated technology-based communications system, established by KRS 156.670, shall be used by the Department of Education to conduct internal fiscal, management, and compliance audits of each school district in the Commonwealth on an annual basis. A copy of the audit shall be submitted to the Legislative Research Commission, the Governor, and the Kentucky Board of Education.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. III, sec. 102, effective July 13, 1990.
